ygData.subject: Re: Wedding Invitation - Quellious Server
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a level 5 human cleric (Trisango) on Brel.  I don t play her often, what with the wedding and all.  She and my partner are already married in this
ygData.messageBody:
I have a level 5 human cleric (Trisango) on Brel. I don't play her often,
what with the wedding and all. She and my partner are already married in this
story, though. Uprooted from her home to follow her childhood sweetheart on a
ridiculous quest (he insisted he had to be a monk during his "death" on
Quellious) she is very lonely and hates Freeport and has fun aggravating her
spouse by flirthing with other men *grin*. I like her a lot *smile*

Can she join?

Trisango

Christina Norman wrote:

> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
>
> Hi Suzanne,
>
> The server is Brell Serelis.
>
> A brief update, my character Luna has reached 16th level on Brell. I've
> pretty much given up on all my other characters to focus on her. In part
> this is so I can provide items cheap to my guildmates. She is a Jewler
> capable of making electrum and silver jewlery, and also a master smith.
> I'll make items for the guild at cost. I hope this will help everyone get
> their characters jump started.
>
> When the guild is official I will also try and organize newbie nights,
> when we will hopefully be able to hunt together, make eachother patchwork,
> etc.
>
> - Christina
>
> On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, Suzanne J. Johnson wrote:
>
> > From: "Suzanne J. Johnson" <katannah@...>
> >
> >
> > Cool. What server is that on?
> >
> > Sara, Povar
> >
